18:08 <vmassol> hmm  
18:08 <vmassol> actually each subwiki has its color theme  
18:08 <vmassol> for ex http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ColorThemes/XEnterpriseCT  
18:08 <vmassol> it's set correctly but is ignored for some reason
